title: How to Make Banana Pudding Cheesecake

steps.headline: Whisk the cream cheese and 1/2 cup (120 mL) milk together using a hand or stand mixer.
steps.description: Blending in the milk a little at a time makes it easier for everything to combine thoroughly.

steps.headline: Beat in the rest of the milk with the pudding mix for a minute.
steps.description: You just want to incorporate everything together; do not over beat them.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into the pie crust.
steps.description: Use a rubber spatula or the side of a knife to evenly distribute it.

steps.headline: Chill the pie in the refrigerator until the pudding has settled.

text: Whisk the cream cheese and 1/2 cup (120 mL) milk together using a hand or stand mixer. Blending in the milk a little at a time makes it easier for everything to combine thoroughly. Beat in the rest of the milk with the pudding mix for a minute. You just want to incorporate everything together; do not over beat them. Pour the mixture into the pie crust. Use a rubber spatula or the side of a knife to evenly distribute it. Chill the pie in the refrigerator until the pudding has settled.  Finished.
